football.text: How many players are on a football team on the field at one time?
football.explanation: A football team has 11 players on the field at any given time.

football.text: What is the maximum duration of a FIFA World Cup match including extra time?
football.explanation: A match can last up to 120 minutes including 30 minutes of extra time.

football.text: Which card is shown for a serious foul in football?
football.explanation: A red card is shown for serious fouls, violent conduct, or receiving two yellow cards.

football.text: What is the standard size of a football goal?
football.explanation: FIFA regulation goal size is 7.32 meters wide and 2.44 meters high.

football.text: Who is known as 'The King of Football'?
football.explanation: Pelé is widely known as 'The King of Football' and is considered one of the greatest players of all time.
